Q.L: India mittit ebur, molles sua thura Sabaei?
At Chalybes nudi ferrum, virosaque Pontus
Continuo has leges, aeternaque foedera certis

DIV1.P: LONDON: Printed by DANIEL BROWNE, For R. DODSLEY, in Ball-mall; M. COOPER, in Pater-noster-Rw; J. SWAN, near Northum∣berland-House; and Mr. BARRET, in the High Street, Oxford.
HIS ROYAL HIGHNESS FREDERICK Prince of Wales, THIS POEM Is most humbly addressed,

CLOSER.SIGNED: By His Most Devoted, Most Obedient, And most Humble Servant, CORNS. ARNOLD.

DIV1.HEAD: The ARGUMENT.
DIV1.P: Line 1, Exordium on the PRINCE. L. 16, Invocation on Com∣merce. L. 24, Her Effects. L. 43, A Fleet fitted out. L. 49, Bay of Biscay describ'd. L. 54, Compared with the Irish Sea. L. 59, Description of a Wreck. L. 64, Voyage to the Atlantic, to Africa, to the Streights, the German Ocean, to Russia. L. 78, Encomium on Peter the Great, Czar of Muscovy. L. 101, Transition to Dover, the Cliffs described. L. 106, Transition to London. L. 110, Encomium on Queen Elizabeth. L. 115, Effects of Persecution. L. 120, Reflec∣tions on it. L. 135, Description of the Royal Exchange. L. 147, Character of the benevolent Merchant. L. 157, Ap∣plied to some Gentlemen. L. 161, Encomium on his present MAJESTY. L. 166, Digression on Liberty and her Effects. L. 171, Digression on Italy. L. 178, Consequences of Bigotry and arbitrary Power. L. 184, Digression on Spain. L. 188, Effects of false Pride. L. 195, Digression on France and Louis XIV. L. 197, Richlieu and Fleury compared. L. 205, Application to Britain. L. 212, Digression on Holland, and the Effects of Commerce there. L. 220, Reflection on Britain, and the British Fishery. L. 228, Encomium on Alderman Janssen. L. 233, The Muse's Prayer. L. 246, Encomium on the PRINCE. L. 253, Digression on Happiness. L. 262, Application of the whole to the PRINCE.

LG.L: WHILE You, Great Sir, Britannia's rising hope,
Great in Benevolence, superior far
To all the trophies of the sanguine field,
Pursue each plan, each generous design,
To bless mankind, and happiness dispense;
Thus sings the muse—Not dazzl'd with the glare
Of glory, pomp, or acclamation loud;
Mean, when compar'd to the ecstatic joy
Which FREDERICK feels, when thousands croud around,
To bless the bounteous hand—No slavish Bard
Now makes his court by adulation vile,
Nor sings a language foreign to his heart:
Transcendent merit prompts the willing Muse
To blend thy praises with commercial arts,
Arts which she loves—Arts which she boasts are thine.
Hail, Commerce! friendly, universal source!
Of all that's great, magnificent, or good;
Of all that Voyager romantic tells
Of India's wealth—or Virtuoso dreams
Of philosophic stone—oft vainly search'd
In chymic Process, when the heated brain
Of Alchymist boils o'er, and 'fore him rise
Mountains of gold—visionary shades!
The substance thine, O Commerce! thine the art
To make the treasure of each world thy own:
Great Emblem of the sun! whose genial rays
Refresh the earth, whose influence benign
Gladdens all nature with luxuriant smiles;
Nor less Thou cheer'st the habitable globe,
Whose sons with mirth and ruddy vigour glow,
Whose joy-flush'd cheek betokens thou art there:
Albion! to Her thou ow'st thy present fame,
Thy stately buildings, and thy villa's grand,
Thy peopl'd cities, and thy num'rous towns,
Which rise promiscuous, pleasing to the sight,
Thick as the shocks of corn on field new reap'd:
Fain would the Muse the pleasing task pursue,
O! were her numbers equal to the Theme,
Then, as the Bird of Jove, she'd soar aloft,
To sing the Merchant in Pindaric lays;
But ah! she droops the Daedalean Wing,
Her flagging pinions ask an humbler strain.
See! the gay Fleet to various ports consign'd,
Various their freight—rich Industry at helm
Smiles on the jovial Crew, joyous they spread
The bellying Canvas to th' impelling Wind,
Traverse each Pole, and distant worlds explore;
Nor Torrid Zone, nor Frigid, bound their course.
These, dauntless, brave the wide Biscayan Bay,
Well known to Mariners for boist'rous wave,
And swell of Surges vast—an horrid Vale!
The liquid Mountains rear their tow'ring heads,
And hurl defiance at th' affrighted sky.
Yet are thy seas more safe than those which lash
The ragged Coasts of rough Hibernia's shore;
Oft seen in vain—oft has the greedy Eye
Of Mariner devour'd thy hill—O Hoath!Hoath—a hill well known, at the entrance of the Bar of Dublin.
Ah! never shall he reach thy friendly shore,
Ah! never tread thy hospitable land:
See! every Plank convulsive tremor feels,
In cruel conflict with th' insulting Foe,
Till bulging seas decide the dreadful strife.
Some the Atlantic plough, Pacific call'd,
Tho' oft the loud-tongu'd waves contentious brawl,
In uproar wild—Onward they steer their course,
To Afric's parched clime, whose sooty Sons,
Thro' rage of civil Broils—hard Destiny!
Forc'd to the Eastern or the Western Ind,
In slav'ry drag the galling chain of Life.
These pass the Streights, coasting the Tuscan shore
To sea-born Venice, or the proud Levant:
Delicious Voyage! whose variegated scenes
Strike with fresh wonder, and a new delight.
The German Ocean those, where Boreas rough,
Bracing the nerves with strength, hardens to Toil
The Nations of the North; leaving the Sound,
O'er Baltic Seas, they visit Russia's Sons;
A rude, uncultivated, rugged Race,
Till smooth'd by Commerce, rear'd by Peter's hand,
Great Peter! who forsook th' Imperial throne
To teach his people Arts unknown before.
Say, Muse—what is't to brave the world in arms?
This Alexander, Charles, and Caesar did,
Mighty Destroyers! Ravagers at large!
Once heav'n-commission'd Scourges of mankind!
'Gainst Thee in truth's eternal balance weigh'd,
How does the scale fly up, and kick the beam!
How light to Thee! who taught the social arts,
And made man mild, and sociable to man:
This mighty work for You reserv'd, great Czar!
Unequall'd Man! who tam'd the savage mind,
Chipt off th' incrusted Di'mond's rougher coat,
New set its native lustre full to view;
By Commerce You bid Petersburgh arise,
Great Mistress of the North, whose brilliant Court
Rivals in splendour Europe's grand Versailles.
But whither would the Muse transport me?—far
O'er endless tracks of congregrated Snow—
Adieu! these frozen Worlds—our native Clime
Demands us—Lo! what sea-bleach't Cliffs are those?
White as the sheep new shorn—Dover! they're thine,
O Albion! whence thy Name—which from the Beach
Rise dreadfully majestic—Semblance fit
Of thy superior Sway, and height of Rule!
What do I see!—what those aspiring domes!
Hail! fairAugusta—London so called. Augusta, Mistress of the world!
Thy fav'rite, Commerce, here has fix'd her throne,
Here holds her Reign supreme—long may She reign!
Triumphantly, as erst when England's Queen,
Elizabeth! renown'd for Arts and Arms,
Britannia sway'd—both loving and belov'd—
A more than match for thy Armada, Spain!
'Twas She receiv'd thee, Commerce, when expell'd
The Netherlands by D' Alva's tyranny,
Whilst vanquish'd Liberty reveng'd her Cause
On haughty Philip, quitting Belgia's shore,
Brought with Her here the welcome golden Fleece,
A mine of wealth surpassing thine, Peru!
Effect most just of Persecution vile!
Thus may Oppression, Cruelty, and Lust
Of pow'r, however couch'd in pious terms
Of Inquisition Holy!—Acts of Faith!
Thus ever may they thrive—Good God! that e'er
Thy Creature rational should steel his breast
'Gainst Nature's Voice!—thy Image thus invert!
Is there a Crime on earth, which calls aloud
For Wrath uncommon, and severest Ire?
Tho' tardy vengeance dozing seems to sleep,
Sure it is Cruelty—true fiend of Hell!
When awful cloath'd in mild Religion's dress,
Feasting on blood in horrid massacre;
Tremble at this—Ye Tyrants of the earth!
Thus t' insult your God, and call it, Piety!
Monstrous to thought! Let's quit the gloomy scene.
Lo! Gresham's noble structure, Royal call'd,
Resort of Merchants! venerable Pile!
Where various nations of the peopl'd earth
Transact the Bus'ness of the bustling Globe;
Here the furr'd Russian, and the turban'd Turk,
The trowser'd Dutchman, and the buskin'd Suede,
The plain, rough German, the Italian soft,
The slow, grave Spaniard, and the Frenchman gay:
A world in miniature! Sight most pleasing!
Nothing artic'late thro' the buzzing crowd—
Babel of Melody! harmonious Discord!
Sweeter than Airs by Handel's genius sung—
What glowing Transport heaves th' enraptur'd Breast,
Who can survey this little World around,
With friendly eye, and universal Love;
Whose open face the Image of his heart,
Stranger to dark and sinister designs,
Can smile on all benevolently good,
And in each Man can read his Brother there;
Such is the Merchant, who with gen'rous views
Greatly anticipates the want of Thousands,
Extending Commerce but the more to bless:
Such Barnard, Bethell, Amyand and Van Neck—
Great Sons of Liberty! rich Queen of Arts!
Whose Bliss-diffusive hand makes Albion smile;
Albion! where Plenty, Peace, and buxom Joy,
Led on by GEORGE, alternate revels hold;
Where Property's enjoy'd—where Mercy, Truth,
Together met—proclaim a BRUNSWICK reigns;
Where Liberty and GUELPH in glorious league,
Go hand in hand to guard their mutual Care.
Fair LIBERTY! the Venus of this Isle!
Where Vulcan Industry, when cheer'd by Thee,
Works ev'ry Nerve, nor deems the toil severe:
Absent—thy Daughter Commerce soon would droop,
And happiest lands become a dreary Waste.
O Italy! delightful, beauteous spot!
Couldst thou but boast her gentle golden Reign,
How blest were You! but fate denies too much;
Nature with lavish hand exuberant,
On thee has pour'd her sweets, profusely kind!
Thrice happy land! where Arno's silver stream
Glides gently thro' t' enrich the fertile glebe;
Fertile, alas! in vain, while Papal pow'r
And slavish Bigotry depress the mind;
While lordly Sway, and arbitrary Rule,
Eat up the labour of the hungry Hind
Toiling in vain—well may'st Thou mourn thy lands
Uncultivated, and thy fields forlorn.
With too great happiness unblest—so Spain,
Curst with the treasures of the Indian world,
Supine and slothful, thro' affected Pride,
Boasting Gentility, neglected Trade,
And all was splendid Poverty at best.
Such was Iberia, when Cervantes rose
To ridicule the foible of his Age:
Immortal Quixott! worthy better fate,
Neglect, too oft the Pay of great desert.
Disdaining now the fetters of false pride,
They rouse to Arts, and Manufactures raise—
Fetters! which long oppress'd thee, France! while Lust
Of Monarchy brought low thy Grand Monarque—
Richlieu by Politicks made thy Name rever'd,
Mighty in Arms, and dreaded thro' the World;
But Fleury rose, great Minister, and good!
Sav'd Thee, when almost sunk, by fine wrought schemes,
By Commerce rais'd Thee to an envied height:
Thy Sons soon caught the Flame, and now their Ships,
Extending wide their Traffick o'er the Deep,
Bid fair to conquer th' European World.
Britain! the World's in arms—more dreadful arms,
Than hostile sword, or the loud cannon's Roar;
Pacific Arms! which levell'd at thy Trade,
Thy Basis shake—'tis time to take th' alarm,
By Industry superior to arise;
By honest Councils, and true Patriot Zeal,
To cherish Commerce, and extend her sway.
Commerce! most sov'reign Pow'r! Batavia tell
How She of erst retriev'd thy State distrest;
Strong, incontested proof that She could raise
The lowest states 'bove Kingdoms of the Earth:
Well is it known how thy Petition ran,
Address'd to great Eliza, Albion's Queen;
Eliza heard—Amboyna be forgot—
The Error of thy Reign, Pacific James!
Britons! regard Her with a Sister's eye,
But scorn supplanting by a Sister's hand:
Remember oft your Mother's drooping years
Demand no less your pious Care—she mourns
Her Northern coasts, environ'd all around
With alienBusses—Vessels used in the Herring Fishery. Busses, and a spurious Brood:
What means this Indolence? this Lethargy?
Thus to neglect the Treasure of the Seas—
Britannia! mourn no more—thy Janssen, see!
Extends his ready hand to raise Thee up;
Janssen! whose Head is cool to form the scheme,
As warm his Heart to execute the plan;
Great Patriot! in all may You succeed—
If ought avails the Muse's humble pray'r,
Greatly solicitous for her Country's good—
Hear me, propitious Heav'n! Britannia guard,
Direct her Councils, and extend her Trade;
Save her alike from ministerial Pow'r,
And Patriotism false—give her Nobles
Zeal to assert her Rights—her Sons inspire
With love of Industry and nervous Toil;
Assist her fav'rite Infant at its birth,
The British Fishery—oh! rear it up
With hand benign, bring it to growth mature,
So in return shall Thousands bless thy Name.
Lo! Britain's Genius rising to her aid,
Great FREDERICK vouchsafes to lead theElected Governor of the British Fishery. Van
Of brave Advent'rers in the grand Attempt:
Patron of Arts! YOU ever foremost stand,
In each design to benefit Mankind;
Teach us from Thee to prize commercial Arts,
Teach us Benevolence, so shall we be blest,
So learn wherein true Happiness consists.
But what is Happiness? 'tis not to wear
The ermin'd Robe, the Mitre, or the Crown;
Many have wore these—alas! how wretched!
It is Benevolence—Offspring of Heav'n!
With this compar'd all Qualities are dross,
Mere tinkling cymbals, and an empty sound:
AnHough—late Bishop of Worcester. Hough, aBoulter—late Primate of all Ireland. Boulter,Warham—Archbishop and Chancellor in the Reign of Henry VIII. Warham, and a § More,
Who sent their Wealth Ambassadors to Heav'n,
Knew what it was full well—Immensely blest!
These are but Foils to You, Illustrious Sir!
How shall I paint the Condescension great?
When Princely Dignity vouchsaf'd to stoop
The callous Palm of Artisan to greet;More—Sir Thomas More—Chancellor in the Reign of Henry VIII.
When thro' yourAlluding to the Prince's Journey last Summer. Western Tour, with lib'ral Hand,
In Pleasure's Cup, Humanity You mixt,
And serv'd it round—All was tumultuous Joy!
When blestCorinium—Cirencester in Gloucestershire. Corinium hail'd You as You past.
London! how great thy Triumph! truly great,
More than when Charles his pompous Entry made,
By Monk attended thro' the crowded streets—
Day less auspicious! than when thy FREDERICK
Late deign'd to visit thyAlluding to the Prince and Princess going to Spitalfields. remotest Parts;
To raise the poor Mechanic's drooping heart
By free Access—and Princely Converse mixt
With friendly Talk of Looms and Warps and Woofs,
Arts worthy of a Prince, the Friend of Trade!
Nor less, AUGUSTA, did thy Presence charm!
Hail! gen'rous FREDERICK and AUGUSTA mild!
In whom the social Virtues all unite,
To deal out Blessings to the human Race,
Whose ready Offices out-run the Woe,
And the Heart dictates e'er it reach the Ear.
THEE! the DELIGHT, the TITUS of Mankind:
Thy eldest Hope, MARCELLUS, will arise,
And add new Glories to the BRUNSWICK Line.
